verses.name: Romans 8:5
verses.text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit.

verses.name: Romans 8:6
verses.text: For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.

verses.name: Romans 8:7
verses.text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be.

verses.name: Romans 8:8
verses.text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God.
